alien4cloud.rest.component

Class ToscaTypeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • alien4cloud.rest.component.ToscaTypeController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value={"/rest/catalog/types","/rest/v1/catalog/types","/rest/latest/catalog/types"})
public class ToscaTypeController
extends Object
    This is currently an ui oriented controller that provides types information and dependencies. It should evolve to replace the component controller and provide type catalog REST API.

      • getTypeWithDependencies

        @RequestMapping(value="adv/typewithdependencies/{typeId:.+}/{typeVersion:.+}",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\', \'COMPONENTS_BROWSER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<org.alien4cloud.tosca.utils.TypeWithDependenciesResult> getTypeWithDependencies(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         String typeId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         String typeVersion)
        Get a Tosca Type and all related dependency types.
        Parameters:
        typeId - The id (element id) of the tosca type.
        typeVersion - The version of the tosca type.
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains an TypeWithDependenciesResult .
